name: King Euphralaes the Fifth of Cerenome Cove and Prime Ruler of All That Is and All That Shalt Not Be Named
name_original: King Euphralaes the Fifth of Cerenome Cove and Prime Ruler of All That Is and All That Shalt Not Be Named
description:
Essentially NOT a professional creation, nor anywhere near outstanding in features. I don't know. It's a short little experience with four possible endings and apparently an achievements page (even after creating the achievements page, its purpose still remains a mystery).

Lower your expectations as you swim alongside a King and his heroic deeds of savin-

Let's be real here.

He does that... but not really. But kinda, I guess?

Warning: Slight cursing.

Extra: This has been partly inspired by 'The Stanley Parable' and 'The Temple of No' (there might be some quite a lot of similarities, my similarity detector isn't wasn't functioning), both fantastic games. Check em out!

Extra 2: All four endings ends with a way to reach the title screen for the ease of restarting. Scroll all the way down if you don't see it at first.
